ComicInfo.Title: Part 4 (of 4)
ComicInfo.Summary: The final chapter in a girl’s journey through Hell! Beyond the river Acheron lay the Gates of Hell. The river that circles the Underworld is not the last obstacle that Nancy and the archangel Lucifer would find. Will the reluctant ferryman Charon help the fugitives?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-14 09:25:30. [CVDB243873]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio, Juan José Ryp, Antonio Vasquez, Antonio Vázquez, Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio, Malaka Studio
ComicInfo.Inker: Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio, Juan José Ryp, Antonio Vasquez, Antonio Vázquez, Juan Jose Ryp, Malaka Studio
ComicInfo.Characters: Charon, Lucifer, Mr. Macabre, Nancy Simmons, Satan
